Uses of Class
ch.epfl.alpano.Interval1D

  • Packages that use Interval1D 
    Package Description
    ch.epfl.alpano  

    • Uses of Interval1D in ch.epfl.alpano

      Methods in ch.epfl.alpano that return Interval1D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Interval1D Interval1D.boundingUnion(Interval1D that)
      Creates a new interval made of the smallest and biggest bound of the two interval (this is called a bounding union).
      Interval1D Interval2D.iX()
      Returns the Interval1D along the x-axis.
      Interval1D Interval2D.iY()
      Returns the Interval1D along the y-axis
      Interval1D Interval1D.union(Interval1D that)
      Gives you the union (not a bounding) of two interval.
      Methods in ch.epfl.alpano with parameters of type Interval1D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Interval1D Interval1D.boundingUnion(Interval1D that)
      Creates a new interval made of the smallest and biggest bound of the two interval (this is called a bounding union).
      boolean Interval1D.isUnionableWith(Interval1D that)
      Tells you if you can create an union (not a bounding one!) out of the two interval.
      int Interval1D.sizeOfIntersectionWith(Interval1D that)
      Gives you the size of the intersection of this with that.
      Interval1D Interval1D.union(Interval1D that)
      Gives you the union (not a bounding) of two interval.
      Constructors in ch.epfl.alpano with parameters of type Interval1D 
      Constructor and Description
      Interval2D(Interval1D iX, Interval1D iY)
      Creates a 2D interval.
